name: Pico Space Program
description:
Note: If you can't click on the build button in-flight, you can use the game menu (press enter) > BUILD

#picospaceprogram

Things I had no time to implement (SPOILERS!): 

  • Fuel is not spent, you can fly without any tanks
  • The Picraken will catch you if you fly too far
  • You can place parts disconnected and overlap (tho it's unrealistic it's kind of cool that it gives more artistic freedom :D)
  • No part rotation in build mode
  • You can spin up infinitely fast, and everything will be fine
  • No map or zoom out view

Source (only code, cart coming soon): https://github.com/nothke/PicoSpaceProgram

Changelog:

v1:

  • Crash velocity is now calculated correctly
  • The craft gets pushed now when a part crashes into the planet
